name: Match Puzzle 3D
description: Matching Puzzle is a free and easy Matching Puzzle game for everyone. No more boring like the usual puzzle games. Enjoy the collections of cute animals, sweet fruits, cool toys and more. Goal of Matching It 3D is to find and match 3D objects according to the requirements of each level. Match and Shred various pairs of shiny 3D foods, toys, objects and put them in shredder! It is a new and satisfying experience to shred your stress away.
